title: In the same tradition of the formation of the schools of logical positivism, existentialism, post-structuralism, etc; what western philosophical schools are emerging right now that people are overlooking? Any thinkers in specific? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thinkers since 2009. Various thinkers here, some are listed within the links and are instead known by their movement. Many of these are my own ideas constructed without much reference to anything else, which have been present online at least within my history of philosophy for several years. Note the full listing linked at the bottom is much more detailed and goes back at least to Ancient Chinese philosophy. (HISTORY OF PHILOSOPHY) Idealese (2009) Headache Formalism (2009 or earlier) Meta-Metaphysics (2009) Variety with miscellany (2009) Knowledge is information (2009) Meta-Theory (2009) The Qualific Science (2009) The Philosophy Pill (2010) Pan-Dimensionalism (Dr GerryD, 2010) Metemphysics, Daniel Reurink (by 2010) Bootstrapping (2010) Nessim Nicholas Taleb (Black Swan, 2010) Sam Harris (The Moral Landscape, 2010) MetaModernism (2010 -, terminology from earlier) Alan Hájek (Philosophical Heuristics 2011, 2016) Doomsday Theorists (2012 was the year that brought the most media attention to this subject in history and it was on many people’s minds for the whole year) David Chalmers (-2012-) Coherentism (2013 - 2017 and ongoing) Alain de Botton (2014) General Systems Theory (J.T. Velikovsky, 2015) Asceticureanism (November 21, 2015) Programmable Heuristics (Early 2017) Quadruple Semantics (August 2017) Post-Analytic Philosophy Meta-Coherence (December 2017) The Movement Movement (January 2018) Meta-History (February 2018) Hyperproblems (April 2018) How To Think Like Computers (by May 18, 2018) Knowledge that is Good for Your Skin (July 24, 2018) Advanced Consciousness (July 26, 2018) Ennobled A.I. Theory (by August 12, 2018) Human Determinism (August 2018) Proof of Infinite Souls and Magic Power (September 29, 2018) —History of Philosophy Links (Coppedge)

What is being overlooked is that no-one has ever known what philosophy is. And this is despite a clear simple definition being available on the internet for two decades. (see Philosophy is the study of how truth is created' by P Atkinson (01-May-19) )
